name: Go
description: GoLang is a statically typed, compiled programming language that is known for its concurrency features and efficient performance.

name: TypeScript
description: A strongly typed superset of JavaScript that is used to build large-scale web applications.

name: JavaScript
description: A single-threaded, interpreted programming language that is primarily known for its use in building interactive web pages.

name: Python
description: A high-level, interpreted programming language that is primarily known for its readability and use in scientific computing.

name: Java
description: A object-oriented, compiled programming language known for it's consistent syntax and portability.

name: Next
description: A full-stack framework for building server-side rendered (SSR) web applications using React.

name: React
description: A JavaScript Library used to build user interfaces/Single Page Applications utilizing JSX and a virtual DOM.

name: Astro
description: A web framework built for content-driven websites, known for it's performant static site generation and island architecture with support for several frontend frameworks.

name: Svelte
description: A UI frontend framework for building performant, interactive web applications known for it's use of compiling to vanilla JS rather than the use of a virtual DOM.

name: SvelteKit
description: A full-stack framework for building server-side rendered (SSR) web applications using Svelte.

name: Nuxt
description: A full-stack framework for building server-side rendered (SSR) web applications using Vue.js.

name: Vue
description: A front-end framework for building user interfaces/Single Page Applications with a focus on simplicity and ease of use.

name: Flask
description: A lightweight web framework for Python for it's simplicity and ease of use.

name: Express
description: A fast and minimalist web framework for Node.js.

name: OpenAI
description: An AI research company that provides a variety of AI models for use in applications.

name: Ionic
description: A mobile app development framework for building cross-platform mobile apps using either Angular, React, or Vue.

name: TensorFlow
description: An open-source library for machine and deep learning.

name: OpenCV
description: An open-source library used for real-time computer vision and machine learning.

name: D3
description: A JavaScript library for creating custom, dynamic data visualizations.

name: p5.js
description: A JavaScript library for creating custom, dynamic art/visualizations.

name: Deno
description: A JavaScript runtime with built in TypeScript support, designed to be a modern, secure, and performant.

name: Docker
description: An open source platform for simplifying the deployment of applications via containerization.

name: AWS
description: A cloud computing platform for building, shipping, and running applications in containers.

name: GCP
description: Google Cloud Platform.

name: Vercel
description: A platform for building, shipping, and running applications in containers known for it's simplicity and Next/SvelteKit support.

name: Heroku
description: A platform for building, shipping, and running applications in containers.

name: Github Actions
description: A continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) platform for building, testing, and deploying code.

name: Auth0
description: An authentication platform for building secure applications.

name: Postgres
description: An open-source relational database management system.

name: MongoDB
description: A document-oriented NoSQL database that is known for its scalability and flexibility.

name: MySQL
description: An open-source relational database management system.

name: SQLite
description: A lightweight, serverless, and zero-configuration SQL database engine.

name: Tailwind
description: A utility-first CSS framework with a focus on simplicity, customizability, and speed.

name: Bootstrap
description: A plug and play CSS framework for building responsive websites.

name: Material UI
description: An open-source React component library that implements Google's Material Design.

name: Node
description: A javascript runtime built on chrome's v8 engine.

name: Figma
description: A design tool for creating user interfaces and prototyping.

name: PHP
description: A server-side scripting language that powers the majority of the web.

name: HTML
description: A markup language for creating web pages.

name: CSS
description: A style sheet language for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML.

name: Android
description: An open-source operating system for mobile devices.
